tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FashionShowInvitations (
  invitation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_name VARCHAR(50),
  guest_email VARCHAR(100),
  guest_category VARCHAR(50),
  attending BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE GuestList (
    guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Invitation (
    invitation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_id INT,
    event_date DATE,
    event_location TEXT,
    event_theme TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_guest_id FOREIGN KEY (guest_id) REFERENCES GuestList(guest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FashionShow (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               event_name VARCHAR(255),
               event_date DATE,
               location VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE Attendee (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               name VARCHAR(255),
               email VARCHAR(255),
               profession VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE Invitation (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
               attendee_id INT,
               fashion_show_id INT,
               status VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE GuestList (
  guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_name VARCHAR(50),
  invited_by VARCHAR(50),
  invitation_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (invitation_id) REFERENCES Invitation(invitation_id)
);
